Posts.Content: Mydear friend has just has her mascectomy  and at the same time the sentinal node biopsy was done- they found a microscopic piece in the node. she will have her results in 2 weeks.  I have another friend who has breast cancer too but she had a lumpectomy  in October and now she needs to have a mascectomy. ( actually having now as I write this)  This lady said she was given a brain and bone scan after finding something in the nodes so do all people have this. It came back negative - relief!!!
Posts.Title: microscopic piece in sentinel node- what does this really mean ?
